name: OtherBipolarDisorder
title: Other Bipolar Disorder
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of other bipolar disorder.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of other bipolar disorder, bipolar II disorder or unspecified bipolar disorder.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis of bipolar I disorder or manic episode.)
